name: All Star Action
overview: Test your strength in fast races and sporting events. The ultimate in fun for you and your friends. Enthralling, intoxicating action-packed suspense! All Star Action is a compilation of 2 discs that contain the 12 games "Battle Trucks", "Xtreme Boarders", "Power Riders", "Revs", "Ride The Waves", "Speed Demon", "Stock Car Race", "Superbike GP", "Surfing Paradise", "Top Speed Rally", "Turbo Race 2" and "Water Power Jet". This compilation was only released in Europe.
